headline: KKR to Present at the Bank of America Securities 2026 Financial Services Conference
summary: NEW YORK, January 28, 2026--KKR & Co. Inc. (NYSE: KKR) announced today that Robert H. Lewin, Chief Financial Officer, will present at the Bank of America Securities 2026 Financial Services Conference on Tuesday, February 10, 2026 at 2:40PM ET.

headline: Retirees Are Collecting 9.5% Monthly From An Overlooked Preferred Stock Fund
summary: The Virtus InfraCap U.S. Preferred Stock ETF (NYSEARCA:PFFA) delivers a 9.5% yield, but many retirees are missing it. How PFFA Generates Its Yield PFFA holds a diversified portfolio of 188 preferred securities issued by corporations. These preferred stocks function as a hybrid between bonds and common equity, with companies issuing them at fixed dividend rates ... Retirees Are Collecting 9.5% Monthly From An Overlooked Preferred Stock Fund

headline: Here Are Wednesday’s Top Wall Street Analyst Research Calls: Applied Materials, Celestica, Circle Internet, Coinbase Global, FormFactor, PayPal, Microchip Technology, and More
summary: Pre-Market Stock Futures: The futures are trading higher after a seesaw day across Wall Street, where the tech-heavy Nasdaq roared higher. At the same time, the Dow Jones Industrials were crushed, primarily due to a near 20% decline in UnitedHealth Group, Inc. (NYSE: UNH) following a weak Medicare reimbursement rate proposal for 2027.
